variables.name: CDATA
variables.comment: * Since we don't do validation, pretty much everything is CDATA type.

methods.name: abstract long getParserPointer()
methods.comment:
* Gets the pointer to the parser. We need this so we can get to the
     * interned string pool.

methods.name: public abstract long getPointer()
methods.comment:
* Gets the pointer to the underlying attribute array. Can be 0 if the
     * length is 0.
